Title: Framework for Playstation Move on PC (Windows)
Description:
This framework gives you the possibility to use the Playstation Move on PC (Windows only).

With the Calibration Tool you can calibrate your device, so the framework can track it very accurate. You can test it as well with Calibration Tool.

With the Move Framework, you can integrate all the possibilities of motion tracking in your programs and games! It is developed in C++, but with a wrapper, you can use it almost everywhere.
HomeWiki: The project is maintained here from now on!
